faq.q1: What do I need to get started?
faq.a1: All you need is a digital wallet like Metamask and a small amount of cryptocurrency to cover transaction fees.
faq.a2: Yes, when used properly. Our platform uses audited smart contracts, and we always recommend safe practices like securely storing your private keys.
faq.q3: How much money do I need to start?
faq.a3: You can start with any amount, even small. Unlike traditional banks, there’s no minimum investment required.
